history.proof: intros a p Hcan. srun best use: pluspf_is_plusP, plusP_decomp, plusP_uniq_eqP.

exceptions.tactic: unfold eqP, eqPf, pluspf, plusP, plusp in *.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce eqP to an evaluable reference.
The reference HeqP was not found in the current environment.

original: intros a p Hcan. unfold eqP, eqPf, pluspf, plusP, plusp in *. simpl in Hcan. intro HeqP. apply HeqP.
